---
title: "Query Lesson Sept 7 2017"
output: html_document
---
query<-"SELECT playerID,teamID,yearID,HR FROM Batting 
WHERE teamID='NYA' and HR>=40"

sqldf(query)

#-------------------------

query<-"SELECT playerID,teamID,yearID,HR,SO FROM Batting WHERE
HR>40 and SO<60"

sqldf(query)

#------------------------

query<-"SELECT playerID,teamID,yearID,HR FROM Batting
WHERE teamID='PHI' and yearID>1969 and yearID<1980 and HR>30"

sqldf(query)

#------------------------

query<-"SELECT playerID,teamID,yearID,HR FROM Batting
WHERE HR>50 ORDER BY HR DESC"

sqldf(query)

#------------------------

query<-"SELECT playerID,teamID,yearID,SO,AB FROM Batting
WHERE SO<10 and AB>=400
ORDER BY SO"

sqldf(query)
